answers.answer: Hi,If you get nocturnal erections, then one thing is sure is that you don’t have any problem of erectile dysfunction. Hence, it seems like the problem is more of psychological in nature and there’s unlikely to be any other pathology like diabetes, hypertension or any neurological disease which is interfering in the erections. The anxiety to perform is what leads to this erectile dysfunction. I think for the initial few times you can do mutual masturbation and then only progress to sexual intercourse. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care.

question: I am 29 and started having sex just a couple of months back.I get good and long nocturnal erections, also have been masturbating all these years.But, its been couple of months now and still I am not able to get any erection when having sex with my girl friend.I have PE just after couple of minutes into sex with out any erection.And, after ejaculating, its just impossible to even touch my penis.I even tried to masturbate while in a foreplay with my gf..but my penis doesnt respond at all.Initially, I thought it might be a psychological problem as I was having sex for the first time.But, I dont understand, whats wrong with me?Please help.
title: what's wrong with me?
